Package edu.ncsu.csc216.hloj.model.manager

Class CustomerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.hloj.model.manager.CustomerManager
  • public class CustomerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    CustomerManager manages the SortedList of customers for the coffee shop, Customers can be added/removed/edited. Can pass a display array.
    Author:
    Claire Davis, Ashten Herr

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Adds a customer to the customers sorted list.
      void editCustomer​(int idx, Customer customer)
      Edits a current customer at a certain index.
      Customer getCustomer​(int idx)
      Returns customer at specified index.
      Customer getCustomer​(java.lang.String id)
      Returns a customer with a specific id.
      Customer[] getCustomers()
      Returns a String array of customers.
      static CustomerManager getInstance()
      getInstance class returns the current instance of CustomerManager, if null then a new CustomerManager is created.
      void removeAllCustomers()
      removes all of the customers in the customers list (resetting the Sorted List)
      void removeCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Removes a customer from the customers Sorted List.

      • getCustomer

        public Customer getCustomer​(java.lang.String id)

        Parameters:
        id - - id value of the Customer
        Returns:
        - customer with specified id

        Parameters:
